subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Quick Step-Innergetic team leader Tom Boonen, Belgium’s biggest cycling star, helped his sprint partner and compatriot Gert Steegmans to his first Tour de France stage victory.
snippet: Quick Step-Innergetic team leader Tom Boonen, Belgium’s biggest cycling star, helped his sprint partner and compatriot Gert Steegmans to his first Tour de France stage victory.
